messages.title: I'll be a strong advocate for you, and secure a good deal for Brecon & Radnorshire.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Make Brexit work for Brecon & Radnorshire
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Dan will fight for a deal which keeps access to the Single Market, Locally need to ensure the rural economy which relies heavily on agriculture and the EU is protected and promoted.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Responsible politics: respect and foreign aid
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Dan believes we should have a moral duty to maintain overseas aid and to keep respect at the heart of politics.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Tactical voting is a dangerous gamble here

issues.brexitEurope: Make Brexit work for Brecon & Radnorshire: Dan will fight for a deal which keeps access to the Single Market. Locally need to ensure the rural economy which relies heavily on agriculture and the EU is protected and promoted.

politicalExperience.role: Candidate for Welsh Assembly Mid and West Wales
politicalExperience.achievements: Advocate of Remain for Wales. Progressive think-tank in Wales. He has also been a member of the Labour party all his adult life, since 1992.

endorsements.endorsement: Dan campaigned with Mid and West Wales AMs, Eluned Morgan and Joyce Watson (above), helping them win election in 2016.

images.caption: Dan Lodge with his campaign supporters.
